solution_line_template: First translate the feet to inches or {room_length_feet} feet * {inches_per_foot} inches per foot = <<{room_length_feet}*{inches_per_foot}={room_length_inches}>>{room_length_inches} inches.
Then use length * width which is {room_length_inches} * {room_length_inches} = <<{room_length_inches}*{room_length_inches}={area_square_inches}>>{area_square_inches} square inches.
